data.text: @Haydenfreedom At least I don't have to see his tweets anymore since he blocked me a while ago lol
@Haydenfreedom He's a bit of a tool, wouldn't be surprised if he just made up the positive result to try to support his position on schools...

@Haydenfreedom Check this from Scotland. In Scotland thereâ€™s masks in indoor spaces and restrictions. In England, no masks, isolation or restrictions.  Hard to see how masks are having a real benefit 

https://t.co/yK91XLgbMy

@Haydenfreedom Just nonsense stuff. I love how these self-proclaimed experts ignore studies (like the most recent one) that show masks do nothing to stop transmission in schools but will cling onto anything spurious that highlights their point
@Haydenfreedom The dominant strain there is the .2 we are just getting that now push right through

@Haydenfreedom I have it on good authority* that if South Korea didn't have a mask mandate it would be over a million new cases

*Not good authority at all, in fact its just some random on the internet who has no public health knowledge at all
